name: Capital Southwest Corporation
overview:
Capital Southwest is a publiclyâ€“owned business development company with total assets of $496 million as of June 30, 2010. We provide patient capital to exceptional businesses with significant growth potential. As a public company, we have the flexibility to hold investments indefinitely, which has provided the management teams of our holdings a stable ownership platform since we were founded in 1961.

We are not a private equity firm or a venture capital firm or a fund. Capital Southwest is a business development company with a refreshingly different investment mindset.

funding_round.source_description: WELLOGIX CONCLUDES EQUITY FINANCING; NAMES THOMAS HARPER, III VICE CHAIRMAN AND DIRECTOR
